Title: Relates to the provision of gas service to new customers
Summary: Provides that in the case of any application for gas service to a building which is not supplied with gas, a utility corporation or municipality shall be obligated to provide gas service to such building.
LawCode: Amd ยง31, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the provision of gas service to new customers
